game.s_dis: Subway Surfers: St. Petersburg brings players to snowy Russia, playable online unblocked with winter-themed characters, boards, and festive collectibles like snowflakes.
game.l_dis:
Subway Surfers: St. Petersburg – Dash Through the Snowy Streets of Russia

Subway Surfers: St. Petersburg immerses players in the wintery streets of St. Petersburg. Run, jump, and slide along snowy tracks, dodging trains, barriers, and collecting coins, snowflakes, and power-ups.

What is Subway Surfers: St. Petersburg?

This seasonal World Tour edition features St. Petersburg’s snowy streets, festive decorations, Russian folk music, and winter-themed characters and boards. Collect snowflakes during Weekly Hunts for special rewards.

How to Play Subway Surfers: St. Petersburg?

  • Swipe Controls: Swipe up to jump, down to roll, left/right to switch lanes.
  • Collect Coins & Snowflakes: Gather coins, snowflakes, and other items to unlock Weekly Hunt rewards like hoverboards and keys.
  • Dodge Obstacles: Avoid trains, icy barriers, and winter-themed hazards while maintaining your run.
  • Use Power-Ups: Activate magnets, jetpacks, and hoverboards to extend your run and maximize your score.

Why Play Subway Surfers: St. Petersburg Unblocked?

Experience the snowy, festive streets of Russia in Subway Surfers: St. Petersburg online without restrictions, unlock new characters, boards, and seasonal collectibles.

Key Features

  • St. Petersburg Environment: Explore snow-covered streets, holiday decorations, and scenic Russian landmarks.
  • Exclusive Characters & Boards: Unlock festive characters and winter-themed boards.
  • Endless Runner Gameplay: Classic swipe-based controls with a snowy, festive twist.
  • Special Collectibles: Collect snowflakes for Weekly Hunt rewards.
  • Unblocked Online: Play instantly in your browser anywhere.

Master St. Petersburg's Subway Tracks!

Run, jump, and slide through Subway Surfers: St. Petersburg to beat obstacles, collect rewards, and enjoy the festive winter environment!
